column2: In this task, you will try to press a number on the keyboard corresponding to different fingers on your two hands. Try to respond as quickly and accurately as possible.  Press any key to continue

Now you will do a block of trials with following responses: 
    <LABEL>
Place your hands on the number line with left index fingers on 5, and your right index finger on 6.  Use the number line on the keyboard to make responses as quickly and accurately as possible.

Press any key to begin.
Press key indicated by lighted number
